thread.title: 18 Places You Should Go to Recharge
thread.title_full: 18 Places You Should Go to Recharge

author: Ashley Paige
title: 18 Places You Should Go to Recharge
text:
Places to Visit If You're Stressed 18 Places You Should Go to Recharge January 25, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 18 Places You Should Go to Recharge 
At times, life feels like one continuous meh Monday . Maybe you're in a rut at work, a relationship is failing, you're behind on payments, or all of the above. Most of us have been there, and while it sucks a LOT, sometimes the fix is relatively simple — a vacation. And not just any vacation, but one in which you're able to completely de-stress and recharge so you can tackle obstacles as they come. Check out the 18 destinations ahead, which are perfect for those riddled with anxiety .
